text:
This was such a fun watch lmao Agassi and Sampras beefing at a charity event mic'd up, Federer trying to redirect attention and get Nadal involved, Nadal blissfully unaware and barely able to speak English but also being too competitive
I also really liked the one at AO that same year where Nadal almost hit Serena with a smash and she spent the whole match trying to get him back ğŸ’€ he also hit double slam dunk overheads and told Kim Clijsters to stop feeling up his leg.
